The acceleration in the rate of statural growth begins with the first signs of puberty in girls (S2), and is delayed in boys (G3). The average pubertal growth peak is 20-25 cm in girls and 25-30 cm in boys.

question.question: When does the acceleration in the rate of statural growth begin?
question.option_a: After the first signs of puberty in girls (S2)
question.option_b: After the first signs of puberty in boys (G3)
question.option_c: During the first signs of puberty in girls (S2)
question.option_d: After the first signs of puberty in boys (G3)
